summary: This document is the Sixth Amendment to the Jeffrey E. Epstein 2001 Trust One, executed by Jeffrey E. Epstein on August 4, 2007. The amendment adds a provision granting Epstein's interest in KCAC, LLC, a New Jersey limited liability company, to Darren K. Indyke. The document is notarized by Lauren J. Kwintner.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: The grantor and creator of the Jeffrey E. Epstein 2001 Trust One who is executing this sixth amendment to the trust document.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: The individual to whom Jeffrey E. Epstein is granting all of his interest in KCAC, LLC, via this trust amendment.

persons.name: Lauren J. Kwintner
persons.context: The notary public for the State of New York who witnessed and notarized Jeffrey E. Epstein's execution of this trust amendment.

connections.description: Epstein is transferring his financial interest in KCAC, LLC, to Indyke via a trust amendment.
Kwintner notarized the legal document executed by Epstein.

events.title: Execution of Sixth Trust Amendment
events.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein executed the Sixth Amendment to his 2001 Trust One, granting his interest in KCAC, LLC, to Darren K. Indyke.

keyFacts: Jeffrey E. Epstein executed the Sixth Amendment to his 2001 Trust One on August 4, 2007.
The amendment granted all of Epstein's interest in KCAC, LLC, a New Jersey limited liability company, to Darren K. Indyke.
This document indicates a significant financial transfer from Epstein to Indyke in 2007.
The document lists five prior amendments to the trust made between 2003 and 2007.
The document was notarized by Lauren J. Kwintner, a Notary Public for the State of New York.
